customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed. I never tried Nespresso before buying this machine, I had always thought "that has to be some fake over-flavored crap from Nestlé". I was completely wrong and ignorant all this time. This is not a weak coffee like Kuerig, and it's not full of unnatural flavors, this is quality coffee/espresso with layers of taste. The coffee is INTENSE, if you have 3 beverages you'll be up all night. I'll never look at my BUNN the same, the Nespresso Vertuo Evoluo is a game changer. Even though this is not commercial grade, I think we might get one for our office (to use in conjunction with our drip-brewer).
customer_reviews.author: EAL

customer_reviews.title: Best cup of coffee you can instantly make
customer_reviews.text: Nespresso > Keurig, hands down. This is a great and reliable machine. Coffee brews immediately; the disposal mechanism is cool, and it complements our Original Line Nespresso beautifully. The only obvious downside is that this is an expensive habit to maintain, but you undeniably get what you pay for. The capsules these machines press produce some fantastic coffee.
customer_reviews.author: jib jose

customer_reviews.title: Commercials got me
customer_reviews.text: Danny Devito and Clooney really got to me, I’m unhappy with the entry level Keurig I have and rather than upgrade that I got this. If you like really bold coffee and shots of espresso that will wake the dead, this is the machine for you. The only negative is the price for each pod and availability, you cannot find them at a grocery store and they run you about $1 a cup of coffee vs a Keurig cupbis about 50 cents
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Y

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE
customer_reviews.text: We have had it for about 5 weeks and it no longer turns on. UPDATE: Contacted Nespresso and spoke directly to a customer service rep that sent me a new machine. She also included a sample pod kit for my troubles and got me signed up in the Nespresso club which I never even knew existed. She was very helpful and went above normal service to get us satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting coffee
customer_reviews.text: I bought this about 6 months ago to use at work. I have been very happy with it. It makes consistent tasty coffee. I have tried the espresso and 8 oz sized pods for it and in each case it makes a very frothy coffee. I personally prefer the 8oz version. Making coffee is easy. Refilling and cleaning it is also very easy. Very happy with the purchase. I am buying another for home. I used to drink 4 cups of Keurig coffee each day. From this machine I am down to 2 cups a day.
customer_reviews.author: Tiger Rider

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful luxurious cup of coffee topped with crema
customer_reviews.text: I was thrilled with this coffee while staying at a lovely Inn and immediately came home and ordered one for myself. I never knew there was a coffee pot that made coffee topped with crema! I absolutely love it. Another great feature is that it has the most unique way of disposing of the used pods, just open to insert a new one and the used one slides gently into it's own area for later clean up. I was also welcomed with a wonderful sample of 15 different levels of coffee for me to sample. Totally satisfied and anxious for my next cup of coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Sounds like a chainsaw and shakes like an earthquake but the coffee tastes good
customer_reviews.text: Ok I didn’t review this for a while it makes a fantastic cup of coffee BUT now it’s not that old it has become so loud it literally wakes people up in my house and it shakes the cup off the holder so if I make a cup of coffee I have to stand there and hold it or it will vibrate off on to the floor
customer_reviews.author: john

product_meta.description: Style:Machine only| Color:BlackNespresso is constantly evolving the way you drink espresso and coffee. Offering freshly brewed coffee with crema as well as delicious, authentic Espresso, the Vertuo Evoluo machine conveniently makes two cup sizes, 7.7 fl. oz. Coffee and 1.35 fl. oz. Espresso, at the touch of a button. It uses two different capsule sizes: large capsule for Coffee and a small one for Espresso. Vertuo Evoluo coffee makers deliver a perfect cup of coffee time after time, thanks to Centrifusion, a patented extraction technology developed by Nespresso. Vertuo Evoluo uses an intelligent extraction system that recognizes each Grand Cru blend. Thanks to a barcode on the rim of the capsule, the brewing parameters are adjusted by the machine, with no need to change settings. This delivers the best in-cup result for your chosen variety - at the touch of a single button. The capsule is automatically ejected after brewing, with only 15-20 seconds of pre-heating time, while the automatic energy-saving function switches the machine off after 9 minutes of inactivity, consuming less energy. Each machine includes a welcome set with 12 VertuoLine capsules, each with varying intensities and taste profiles.
